thread.title: Darryl Graham

author: Darryl Graham
title: Darryl Graham
text: My account manager Monica Pavliga was a pleasure to work with. I began requesting product Quote: s late 2016. Monica provided excellent follow up and was quick to provide additional Quote: s. There was never preasure from her to close the sale. Instead allowed me to take the time I needed to get my quantities correct. Thank you Monica and Flashbay for delivering a superior products and excellent service.
